::KitKat::

She stopped and transformed into bot mode.  She screamed at the top 
of her lungs, "LEAVE ME ALONE! GO AWAY!"
She drew her gun and fired randomly around her.
Her logic ciruits were getting fried.  A small ribbon of smoke crept 
out of her head plating.  She ran up the hill and started running 
along the side of the hill.
